column4: I've just installed sun-java6-plugin. Can anyone tell me why Firefox won't load any java applets?
did you install java 6 using a guide or something?
just aptitude'd it
is there a guide I should have followed?
could you please help install it?
I'm asking for help myself!
lol but you're furthur than i am
it's ok nvm
just one "sudo aptitude install sun-java6-plugin"
but maybe you wanna try, it worked on my girlfriend's machine flawlessly
not the plugin, java 6 JDK
that'd be one among sun-java6-*
btw I got it from edgy-backports
ahh i use dapper
oh ok... different thing then
you can do "dpkg -i *.dpkg"
it'll resolve installation order by itself
hold on... did you see those dapper backports of java6?
I didn't catch the entire thread but why would you not install through the package manager?
yeah i'm looking right now but some of the dependencies aren't there
if it's a backport they should all be in place
you need to add the dapper-backports repository -- you did that, didn't you?
